name: SantaClaus-Christmaslist
0:
”Alexa, tell Santa Claus I want a bike”
”Alexa, ask Santa Claus what is on my Christmas list”
”Alexa, tell Santa Claus to remove the bike from my Christmas list”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa claus
des:
This skill is a super simple Christmas list builder with a bit of Christmas charm built in. It works like this:

ADDING ITEMS TO THE CHRISTMAS LIST

 - "Alexa, tell Santa Claus I want [insert item here]
 e.g
 - "Alexa, tell Santa Claus I want a bike" 

OR 

 - "Alexa, tell Santa Claus I want [insert item here] for Christmas
e.g. 
 - "Alexa, tell Santa Claus I want some toys for Christmas"

Then Alexa will confirm the item and once confirmed she'll get Santa's elves to add it to the Christmas list.

READ OUT THE CHRISTMAS LIST

 - "Alexa, ask Santa Claus what is on my Christmas list'

Alexa will get one of Santa's elves to read out the list.

REMOVE AN ITEM FROM THE CHRISTMAS LIST

 - "Alexa, ask Santa Claus to remove the [insert item here] from my Christmas list"
e.g. 
 - "Alexa, tell Santa Claus to remove the bike from my Christmas list"

The items will be instantly removed.

OR

If the item can not be found in the list then Santa's elves will go through the list one-by-one to find the right item for removal. T

To start going through the list one by one you can also say:
- "Alexa, ask Santa Claus to remove an item from my Christmas list" 

RESETTING THE LIST
Simply disable and re-enable the skill.


Privacy information
Santa Claus - Christmas list securely stores Christmas list items for access by customers at a later date. The information is not presented to anyone except for the anonymous customer ID connected to the list. Usage data is collected by the skill to ensure optimum functionality.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
